name: Mind Snare
flavor: You latch onto your prey's brain and don't let go, like a song they can't get out of their head.

metadata.flavor: You latch onto your prey's brain and don't let go, like a song they can't get out of their head.

effects.tier1: 10 + R psychic damage; R < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
effects.tier2: 14 + R psychic damage; R < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
effects.tier3: 20 + R psychic damage; R < STRONG, slowed (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: While slowed this way, the target takes 3 psychic damage for each square they willingly leave.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: While slowed this way, the target instead takes 5 psychic damage for each square they willingly leave. You have a double bane on ability rolls made against the target while they are slowed this way.
